title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 28 October 2014 - XWiki
content:

10:13 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:14 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
10:27 <gdelhumeau> XWiki 6.3M2 looks really faster than before  
10:27 <gdelhumeau> Thomas has made a good job  
10:30 <cjd> bolt a turbocharger to it https://ezcrypt.it/iT9n#DQhpnEQG1IPKDbhtKtnbE7Vd  
10:34 <andreeapopescu> has joined #xwiki  
10:52 <gdelhumeau\_> has joined #xwiki  
10:52 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
10:59 <cjd> so I did a bit of googling about a "time before bug trackers" because I'm writing a document on how to use these things and wanted it to be somewhat interesting...  
10:59 <cjd> and I ran into this little gem: http://apenwarr.ca/log/?m=200806#28  
11:03 <cjd> I am now feeling unsure of whether bug tracking really helps or hurts... certainly it should not be abandoned without systematic reasoning but from the little essay above, that reasoning seems attainable  
11:44 <vmassol1> guys I have an electrician at home and he'll need to cut the internet connection for about 1 hour in 5 minutes...  
11:44 <vmassol1> so I'll be offline during that time...  
11:46 <Inge-> Quel malheur! Quelle catastrophe!  
11:58 <vmassol1> Inge-: :)  
11:58 <Inge-> that was what my fathers french teacher said when the power went out at school one day ;)  
12:00 <mflorea> has quit

13:36 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
13:39 <Pbas> Meanwhile at Vincent's home: http://www.commitstrip.com/fr/2012/05/02/the-connexion-is-down-isnt-it/ :)  
13:40 <evalica> :)  
13:42 <cjd> I like the use of connexion in english, I might start doing that myself, save a character  
13:45 <Lyes> has quit  
13:58 <Lyes> has joined #xwiki  
14:10 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
14:13 <vmassol> back…. sorry for the delay….  
14:13 <vmassol> catching up  
14:25 <vmassol> gdelhumeau\_, evalica: I see that 2 issues planned for 6.2.3 have been moved to 6.2.4  
14:25 <vmassol> have you discussed this?  
14:26 <evalica> yes - the changes to the templates are too dangerous and not a fix you could do rapidly  
14:26 <vmassol> evalica: so it means we won't do it in 6.2.x?  
14:27 <vmassol> if we don't do it now I don't think we should do it later  
14:27 <evalica> G should tell you this - but for 6.2.3 was too short  
14:27 <vmassol> it's already too late for 6.2.3 actually  
14:27 <vmassol> (should have been done in 6.2)  
14:28 <vmassol> yesterday I asked gdelhumeau\_ to discuss with Anca about it to see what she thinks  
14:28 <vmassol> (since she's installing some 6.2.2 instances and will need to perform the switch)  
14:28 <vmassol> so it's interesting we get her feedback to decide  
14:29 <vmassol> decide whether it's in 6.3RC1 or in 6.2.3 or ....  
14:29 <vmassol> gdelhumeau\_: wdyt?  
14:31 <vmassol> I'll start a discussion  
14:32 <msmeria1> has quit  
14:32 <gdelhumeau\_> back  
14:32 <gdelhumeau\_> I assume you wanted a 6.2.3 asap vmassol  
14:33 <gdelhumeau\_> so I told Caty to postpone these 2 issues to 6.2.4  
14:33 <vmassol> the planning is 30th of October  
14:33 <vmassol> for 6.2.3  
14:33 <vmassol> see the email  
14:33 <vmassol> so it really depends on:  
14:33 <vmassol> - whether we think some issues are blocker or not  
14:33 <vmassol> - how long it takes to do them  
14:34 <vmassol> I'm not saying we shouldn't release now  
14:34 <vmassol> as I said I'm sorry and I was away  
14:34 <vmassol> I'm just checking what discussion you had  
14:34 <vmassol> and why you decided to move those 2 issues  
14:34 <vmassol> that's all  
14:34 <vmassol> :)  
14:34 <evalica> can I go on with the release? It's done.. and I don't know how to revert it … but I guess is possible  
14:35 <vmassol> sure go ahead  
14:35 <vmassol> worse comes worse we'll do another release in 2 days  
14:36 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
14:45 <AFKGeek> has joined #xwiki  
15:02 <andreeapopescu> has left #xwiki  
15:10 <AFKGeek> has quit  
15:13 <msmeria> has quit  
15:24 <vmassol> guys  
15:24 <vmassol> we forgot one blocker issue for 6.2.3 (and even before)  
15:24 <vmassol> http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-10843  
15:24 <vmassol> who could work on fixing it?  
15:34 <mflorea1> has joined #xwiki  
15:34 <mflorea> has quit  
15:36 <vmassol> mflorea1: hi, fyi http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/ReleaseManagerRoster you'll be the one for 6.3RC1 :) Planned date is currently 3rd of November (see http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Roadmaps/WebHome) but we may need to postpone by a few days while still preserving the final date  
15:37 <mflorea1> ok  
15:37 <vmassol> globally I'd like that we have a 6.4 that ends around mid december  
15:37 <vmassol> since end of year is holiday time  
15:37 <vmassol> so better leave 2 weeks of buffer just in case  
15:38 <vmassol> so that we can start the new year on 7.0M1! :)  
15:38 <vmassol> (start of 7.0M1 that is)  
15:38 <vmassol> hope we're all ok with this  
15:39 <mflorea1> fine with me  
15:42 <vmassol> so at last we'll be aligned on the year for our cycles ;)  
15:42 <vmassol> let's hope we won't have to release too many 6.4.x bugfix versions!

17:21 <evalica> there are some problems with the pom version… we are checking it
